content.label: This was such a unique game and I’m glad to see it’s not lost to time
So good

So nice to see this back on the App Store and updated for new devices and operating systems. If you bought this back in the day, like all GameClub games, you can download and play it without joining the service. You will need to create an account but they can’t charge you.

title.label: Very happy that early customers still have access

content.label: I LOVED this game on my old iPad, so was thrilled to see it updated in the App Store, and to see that early customers are able to unlock access to it.... much appreciated. It’s a great game for picking up here and there as a boredom buster.

title.label: Deserves to be on "All-Time Greats" list!

content.label:
Update: WE DID IT BRANDON!!! 

I was fortunate enough to have come across an article that had mentioned this game as one of the Best iOS Games Ever. The article was absolutely right but, unfortunately, 6 years has passed from it's release and billions of other games dawning the retro theme have been piled on since. Nevertheless, Forget.Me.Not is THE quintessential retro game for iOS and could possibly be the best ever in the history of the App Store.
   If you can imagine a gun wielding Pac Man in search of a key amongst the Ghosts who have many different cousins including a dungeon altering wizard...you'll understand the gameplay. The game itself is truly an experience that hearkens back to the quarter dropping days with all of it's neon-pixelated beauty, heart-pounding  blips 'n' bleeps, and frantic levels.
   Multiple game modes and simultaneous two-player (on iPad AND iPhone) is an incredible bonus adding UNLIMITED gameplay. I especially love the fact that the two-player mode can be played competitively or cooperatively depending on the players' strategy. This game really is THE reigning retro champion!
   ***With this said, I'd like to request that this game be updated and respectfully featured please. This game deserves it and so does it's loyal fans.

title.label: Super fun, but not available for new softwares.

content.label: This is one of the games that I have enjoyed most and I couldn’t stop playing it when I had a couple free minutes. I hope they do the new update for the latest versions of iOS.

What could I say that nobody has said? This is a great game, retro simplicity plus new and interesting elements. This is so very playable, and somehow so satisfying, don't let the small size of the file fool you, there is a lot of fun here.

Please update this!! Was such a good game!

THIS little gem would've been a far better PacMan! I rarely get hooked on games and I tend to lose interest rather quickly, so I usually spend a few minutes playing here or there. With Forget Me Not, I've been saying "one more time" for the last hour and I'm not ready to call it a night yet :) There's something special here and it's certainly worth downloading!

title.label: This game is very good but update it for iOS 11

content.label: I love playing this game and I want to play it on iphone 7 on ios 11  please update this game to be compatible with iOS 11 please its not letting me open the app please update it as soon as possible thanks
One of the greatest iOS arcade games
Please don't let this die of iOS 11!

title.label: Please update this gem to iOS 11!

content.label: Please update this for iOS 11, I don't want to lose this treasure of a game!  :(

title.label: This game my phone a virus

content.label: This game gave my phone a virus when i first opened the app it gave me an alert "warning this game might slow down your iphone" then i deleted the game and went into my strings and all of a sudden my screen started glitching very bad...then my whole phone shut down and i had to take it to the apple store and get a new phone
It is so much fun my one complaint is that you can't turn the screen sideways on iPhone other than that it is amazing
icade support makes this even better.
I love this game I play like every day. Sometimes I just get really mad at it but I still like it .so maybe sometime you should play because it is a really great game
game, updated and somehow more awesome than before. This is one of the best arcade games around.
of the App Store.
THIS GAME IS SO AWESOME 5-STAR IS PERFECT THIS GAME IS PERFECT
Wow this is fun. Hard! And I only understand about 60% of what is going on. A perfect balance of quick gameplay, simple strategy, retro sound effects, and surprises.
It's a great game!!!It reminds me about pacman!!I give Forget-Me-Not Five stars
Looks, plays, sounds, and feels like a long-lost classic arcade game. This is one of the App Store's greatest sleeper hits and is pure bliss.
It is good but it is not worth what I paid for it.
Do u know the funny thing is? I can shoot myself'

The reason this game gets a low score for me is due to the fact that my own gun is what kills me every time. My own weapon shouldn't be my worst enemy. It should be what helps me. Would look way better if it was full screen too. Every time I lose its due to my gun shooting myself. 3 lives only and you have to start completely over?? Lol Boooo.

title.label: One of the best games on ios

content.label: Quickly turning into one of my favorite games.
Buy this game.
This game is worth every penny.  Very fun.  Great sound effects.  Would buy part two if it manifested itself.  Lot's of old school arcade feel here.
I bought this game when it first was released and I still come back to it. Lots of originality in gameplay but the fun sounds and graphics will immerse you in a retro wonderland.

title.label: Great game worth playing again and again.

content.label: A great retro-arcade game with tons of surprises and replayability.  I've been playing this game on and off for about a year now, and have a respectable spot on the scoreboards, but today, on a very early level, I stumbled across a new monster type I'd never seen before. So much random procedurally-generated goodness. This game just never gets old.
Awesome game. Love the randomized levels and the retro look and feel. Unfortunately, a bug with this game and its game center implementation causes it to crash on launch unless I'm in airplane mode.
I love this, don't get me wrong, but I only wish the pixels in the graphics were sharper. That's all I ask.
Fantastic old-school arcade style game!
I actually love this game. Please add achievements developer.
Needs game center achievements if it's going to boast supporting them.

title.label: Great game - masterful mixture of monsters

content.label: This is a great game. The monsters and challenges are mixed together such that it always takes more skill - a great distraction that's been fun for longer than any other iPhone game I've bought.

This game is terrific - when it doesn't crash back to the home screen. I am running the most current iOS for the iPhone 4s, so it isn't my device. And out of 10 times opening the app, it crashes 7 or 8 of them. I e-mailed the developer and he responded which is nice, that he is involved still, but that was back in March and no update…
This is a perfect game right here. Endless replay value. Incredible sound effects. Great style. Challenging gameplay. For people who like video games for people with brains.

A fiendishly inventive mix of Pac-Man maze action with Rogue-like adventure.  This plays like some long-lost Atari 800 or 7800 classic from 1984, or one of Jeff Minter's Llamasoft hits, and captures perfectly that simple complexity of classic video games. Always challenging, always surprising, and always compelling.  An iOS classic!

Very nostalgic and fun. Got better after last update. Here are some suggestions for next update: 1. Bigger maps and monsters. Some of us dont have as good a vision. Perhaps a Big Mode? 2. Self-playing mode. Would make a nice visual while just listening to music. And an option to turn sound fx off. 3. Pipboy mode. Simple vector graphics. 4. Cameo by Pac-man. Or Dig-Dug. The game practically has Centipede already in it. Anyways, great game.
Great game!  If you're interested, just buy it.  Even if you're not interested, buy it.  One of the best games in the app store, really.

When I first played, I loved it. I learned so many things like the bomb things ARE really bombs! If you love retro-arcade style games, you'll have hours of fun with this game. Who am I kidding? YEARS of fun!

This is my first time to write a review for a game and I wouldn't be doing this unless I really really thought it deserved a recommendation. If you are a fan of puzzle type games. Tetris, lumines, PAC man, arcade games, etc. you will not be disappointed with this game. I read the reviews and even still was a little bit skeptical because I too think that some of these reviews are fake and bloated to make a game seem more popular. The developer/team or whoever made this game should be applauded. They got it right, its simply put a fantastic retro type feel, the game controls are simple, the gameplay is simple...

I bought it and can't stop playing. Procrastination 1, me 0. :)

forget.me.not is hands down the best arcade games on iOS. I've had this game for (what seems like) over a year, and I continuous come back to play again and again.

Bottom line: forget.me.not is a Gen-Xer wet dream. It will take you back to the days of dumping quarters in arcade machines at Aladdin's Castle, the bowling alley, or putt putt golf.

Seeing this title on the Internet with like a trial download or something. I tried it out and thought meh. Seeing it on the iPad i decided to grab it and I'm glad I did. Forget me not is one of the best and freshest old school style games you can find on the market.
If you like Pac-man, shooting and puzzle solving you will like this game.

2-player FMN on iCade is great: two simultaneous players! One on joystick, one with inverted-T "cursor keys" using the iCade buttons. Try this with Arena mode.

Don't forget to "grind the walls" (try to turn before you really can) to charge your power... I always forget that...

I have to say right off the bat: I thought this game was amazing within the first 30 seconds of starting it up. The controls and idea of the game are simple and easy to understand, yet, when going deeper, you truly understand the depth and complexity found within this game. Everything in this game is fun and thrilling. From keeping up a large point streak, to choosing which enemies to confront or avoid, this game is exiting to the last second of your play through. An absolute must have for anyone looking for excitement and fun in their iPhone game.
You're ganna like the way it plays...I guarantee it!
So addicting. Like being at the arcade again, 10 years old with a ziploc bag full of quarters.
